product.longDescription: Compact, yet heavy heads with a very upright growth habit. Heads remain open, untwisted, and tight across varying conditions. Hearty, juicy leaves like an iceberg, but with better flavor and a pleasingly frilly, lollo-like margin. The tasty leaves are uniform and numerous making them easy to process. Great for burgers, sandwiches, and salads. NOTE: Days to maturity will vary depending on your target weight and growing practices, but you can expect a range of 35–45 days for hydroponically grown, full-size heads. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–26, 32, US 5–9; and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. NOP-compliant pelleted seed. Avg. 12,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Crunchy sandwich-sized leaves and year-round performance. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

Lalique Pelleted Lettuce Seed

Product ID:4184JP.114184JP

Compact, yet heavy heads with a very upright growth habit. Heads remain open, untwisted, and tight across varying conditions. Hearty, juicy leaves like an iceberg, but with better flavor and a pleasingly frilly, lollo-like margin. The tasty leaves are uniform and numerous making them easy to process. Great for burgers, sandwiches, and salads. NOTE: Days to maturity will vary depending on your target weight and growing practices, but you can expect a range of 35–45 days for hydroponically grown, full-size heads. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–26, 32, US 5–9; and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. NOP-compliant pelleted seed. Avg. 12,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
